sentences.en: [as modifier]a last-ditch attempt to acquire some proper qualifications.
sentences.cn: 为取得适当资格的孤注一掷的努力。

sentences.en: [as modifier]a last-ditch attempt to acquire some proper qualifications.
sentences.cn: 为取得适当资格的孤注一掷的努力。

sentences.en: Add the flour last.
sentences.cn: 最后加面粉。

sentences.en: At long last the winter was over.
sentences.cn: 冬季总算过去了

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He won last month's presidential election by a landslide.
sentences.cn: 他以压倒性多数赢得上月的总统选举。

sentences.en: He would be the last person who would do such a thing.
sentences.cn: 他最不可能干这种事情。

sentences.en: I didn’t read the last chapter of the book.
sentences.cn: 我没有看这本书的最后一章。

sentences.en: I hadn’t seen him since the last meeting.
sentences.cn: 自从上次会面后，我再没有见到他。

sentences.en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentences.cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentences.en: I split up with my last boyfriend three years ago.
sentences.cn: 我和前任男友在3年前分手了。

sentences.en: I think having that cup of tea &B{last thing at night} really helps.
sentences.cn: 我认为晚上睡前喝那样一杯茶很有好处。

sentences.en: I think having that cup of tea &B{last thing at night} really helps.
sentences.cn: 我认为晚上睡前喝那样一杯茶很有好处。

sentences.en: Last night he was being held in solitary confinement in Douglas jail.
sentences.cn: 昨晚他被单独监禁在道格拉斯的监狱里。

sentences.en: Last night we hitched the horse to the cart and moved here.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我们套上马车，拉着东西搬到了这里。

sentences.en: last orders, gentlemen, please.
sentences.cn: 请点最后一次酒吧，先生们。

sentences.en: last orders, gentlemen, please.
sentences.cn: 请点最后一次酒吧，先生们。

sentences.en: Last year, economic growth tailed off to below four percent.
sentences.cn: 去年，经济增长率下降到4%以下。

sentences.en: Much has changed since my last visit.
sentences.cn: 自我上次来访后，变化很大。

sentences.en: Poland provide the opposition for the Scots' last warm-up match at home.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在国内最后一场热身赛的对手是波兰队。

sentences.en: She lifted the last of her drink to her lips.
sentences.cn: 她将最后一点饮料送到唇边。

sentences.en: The army is still one of the last male bastions.
sentences.cn: 军队仍然是男人占据的最后堡垒之一。

sentences.en: the dying embers sparked their last.
sentences.cn: 将灭的灰烬冒出最后火星。

sentences.en: The games lasted only half the normal time.
sentences.cn: 这场比赛只持续了正常比赛时间的一半。

sentences.en: The group had a net profit margin of 30% last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，这个集团的纯利润率为30%。

sentences.en: The marriage had lasted for less than two years.
sentences.cn: 这桩婚姻持续了不到两年。

sentences.en: The next meeting will be held in the last week in June.
sentences.cn: 下次会议将于6月的最后一个星期举行。

sentences.en: The spa is the last word in luxury and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 这家矿泉疗养浴场极尽奢华，功效极高。

sentences.en: This club has grown in stature over the last 20 years.
sentences.cn: 这家俱乐部在过去20年间知名度大增。

sentences.en: Troops were sent to the islands to restore order last November.
sentences.cn: 去年11月，军队被派往这些岛屿以恢复秩序。

sentences.en: Two men were helping police with their inquiries at Salisbury last night.
sentences.cn: 两名男子昨天夜里在索尔兹伯里接受了警方盘问。

sentences.en: When I last saw her, she was working in New York.
sentences.cn: 我上次见到她时，她正在纽约工作。

words.tran_cn: 最后的；最近的，最新的；仅剩的；最不可能…的
最后地；上次，最近；最后一点
末尾，最后；上个；鞋楦（做鞋的模型）

phrases.tran_cn: 终于：一段相当长的时间之后；最终
好容易才：经过一段长期而艰辛的等待或耽搁

phrases.phrase: in the (或 as a) last resort

phrases.tran_cn: 最后的但并非最不重要的
持续很久，持续很长时间
［酒吧告知顾客即将打烊］最后一次点酒
深夜（尤指睡前）最后做的事
最不想要的事物；最不适宜的事

trans.tran_cn: 最近的，最后的，最后剩下的
trans.tran_en: The last event, person, thing, or period of time is the most recent one

trans.tran_cn: 最近的，最近一段时间的，最近一次的
trans.tran_en: most recent or nearest to the present time
happening or existing at the end, with no others after
most recent or nearest to the present time

trans.tran_cn: 持续，使继续存在，坚持下去，维持原状，够用
trans.tran_en: If an event, situation, or problem lasts for a particular length of time, it continues to exist or happen for that length of time
to continue for a particular length of time
